name: Zombified - The Text Adventure Game of the Zombie Plague Apocalypse!
name_original: Zombified - The Text Adventure Game of the Zombie Plague Apocalypse!
description:
An intellectual exercise in world-destruction, Zombified is a zombie apocalypse simulator that takes in user-defined variables and then generates an automatic, step-by-step look at the end of the world.

Import your contacts from Address Book or select specific people to include, then build a population of procedurally-generated civilians, drop in a zombie or two and watch the events unfold! With automatically-generated headlines and global news events, you can follow along with every single attack, and watch as the survivors fall before the horde and then struggle to turn the tide.

And by importing your contacts with a single click, your friends will be a part of the simulation! Watch them flee for their lives or stand and fight, and who knows who will be alive by the end? Will the people learn how to survive in the face of the chaos surrounding them, or will humanity fall to the horde? It's all up to you, with Zombified!
